column2: "The siblings living in that lodge over there have been in Kvaris a long time."
"They've been doing their best to restore Lost Central to what it once was."
"I'm a little worried about them. I hope they don't push themselves too hard and wind up hurting themselves."
"Maybe next time I'm making lunches, I should make up an extra one for them and drop it off there. Ehehe, I bet they'd appreciate that."
